mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mvc_customer_tbl WHERE user_id = #{strId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mvc_customer_tbl(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birthday, user_address, user_hp, user_email, user_regdate) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_address}, #{user_hp}, #{user_email}, #{user_regdate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mvc_customer_tbl WHERE user_id = #{strId} AND user_password = #{strPassword}
